introduction: 2005Something happens at the junior high school. When a boy starts to draw a cloud, that drawing begin to move and eat the students...The DVD product "NAOYUKI TSUJI ANIMATION COLLECTION” released from FACETS in 2006 USA, it have defects.The sound track of "Trilogy about clouds” was hole broken. "Looking at a cloud” “From the cloud” these are second and third pieces of trilogy. These have big damage. Here is the original version. I found this reason in 2008. I am apologies to open this reason too late, If you have it .「雲を見ていたら」2005年学校で起こった奇妙な出来事。主人公の男子生徒はノートに雲の絵をスケッチしていた。突然彼が描いていた雲に目が現れ、窓の外から睨みつけてきた。するとノートに描かれた雲の絵がノートから飛び出してきて、彼の鼻から体の中に入り込む…
